summary: Megadeth is an American metal band formed in 1983 by Dave Mustaine. They are known for their fast, complex music and are one of the most popular thrash metal bands. Their albums, like "Peace Sells" and "Rust in Peace," have been big hits. Megadeth has faced challenges, including lineup changes and Mustaine's injury, but they keep making music. They've won a Grammy and sold over 50 million albums worldwide. Their mascot, Vic Rattlehead, is a well-known part of their brand.
title: Megadeth
